_description: On the pride of shoemakers — one six-line stanza

BLAdd60577.Transcription:
Sowters haue a nyse prydeffor they wolle euer on pancers rydeas
                    pultres on polyswhere in londe we may them fyndewe schal turne there
                    arse agayne þe wyndeffor stynke lyke doggus
BLAdd60577.Note:
Translating ‘Sutores vtuntur quadam pompa frenola’,
                    which follows.
